synopsis.text:
Tachibana's monotonous life as a 32-year-old office worker takes an unexpected turn when he and his handsome childhood friend, Jinguji, are transported to a magical realm by a mysterious goddess. Frustrated by his lack of success with women, Tachibana had once joked about wanting to be reborn as a beautiful woman. The goddess grants his wish, transforming him into a stunning blonde-haired, blue-eyed girl. Meanwhile, Jinguji remains his dashing self, as popular with the ladies as ever.

In this new world, the duo is tasked with defeating the Demon Lord to return to their original forms. However, their friendship is put to the test as they navigate their newfound attraction to each other. Will they be able to resist their feelings and complete their mission, or will they succumb to their emotions and remain trapped in their new bodies forever? Join Tachibana and Jinguji on their wild, romantic adventure in this enchanting anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
